product_name: REI Chinuka Rain Jacket - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Thanks to an advanced waterproof/breathable REI Elements(R) shell, the women's REI Chinuka Jacket in plus sizes offers agility and storm protection for climbing and other active pursuits. REI Elements(R) shell features a durable 4-way-stretch nylon that provides waterproof/breathable coverage and is windproof to 60+ mph. Adjustable hood and front zipper's stormflap expand coverage; front zipper is topped by a chin guard. Pit zippers allow ventilation adjustment. Zip pockets secure essentials; chest pocket includes a cord port. Exterior zippers are water resistant. Includes an adjustable hem drawcord. The women's REI Chinuka Jacket in plus sizes has adjustable cuffs and angled cuff backs to extend coverage over the backs of hands.
short_description: Thanks to an advanced waterproof/breathable REI Elements(R) shell, the women's REI Chinuka Jacket in plus sizes offers agility and storm protection for climbing and other active pursuits.
